1. 'The Mummy'(1989)

2. 'Mama'(2013)
   Plot: Ever since surviving a domestic violence attack, Kim Addison has found the courage to take matters into her own hands. After learning MMA training in order to learn self--defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. She has since set out to help others who have been victims of bullying and abuse just like her. Kim' s personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13- year- old Logan Chauvin. Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies.

conversation.text: I would recommend "Final Destination 5" if you're looking for something suspenseful and full of horror. The movie follows a group of teenagers who are on vacation at a beach resort. One day, while they're swimming in the ocean, one of them is killed by an unseen creature. The rest of the group is terrified by what happened to their friend, and decides that they need to leave the beach resort as soon as possible. However, before they can leave, they discover that the unseen creature responsible for killing their friend has actually managed to infiltrate the entire beach resort, and is now lurking around in the shadows, waiting for its next victim.

This movie features an ensemble cast including Kevin Zegers, Aidan Turner, CCH Pounder, and many others.
